{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Belkin |model=F5D6231-4 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/05/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Accton |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=K7SF5D623142 |ic_id=3623A-F5D623V2 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9 |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM8628 |cpu1_cspeed=75 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=SST39VF016-70-4C-EI |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W986432DH-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=ADMtek |wi1_chip1_model=ADM8628 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF3000 |wi1_chip3_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip3_model=RF2958 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=WLAN |default_ssid_regex=^WLAN$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:30:BD |oui_eth=00:30:BD |default_ch= }} ''802.11b Wireless Cable/DSL Gateway Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Belkin|vs_id_old=423}} This device is quite similar to the [[Accton WG3005D]], and is presumably a sub-model of the device. I did, however, not take a photo of the '''Accton''' model sticker during the time I had access to a unit. A user editing this page indicated that his unit had a bad capacitor (particularly ''the big '''Nichicon''' 6.3V 1500Î¼F''). ==Images== File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 angled.jpg|angled File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 bottom 1.jpg|bottom, unit1 File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 bottom 2.jpg|bottom, unit2 File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 back.jpg|back File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 board top.jpg|board top File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 CPU.jpg|ADM8628 CPU File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 flash.jpg|Flash File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 AcctonPN.jpg|Accton P/N File:Belkin F5D6231-4 v2 board bot.jpg|board bot [[Has images::internal| ]]
